mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.dept_id deptId,u.email,u.mobile, u.status,u.sex,ur.role_id roleId from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT U .username, U .user_id userId, D .dept_name deptName, U .mobile, U .email, U .avatar, U .remarks, U .sex, U .dept_id deptId, group_concat(r.role_name) AS roleName FROM t_user U LEFT JOIN t_dept D ON U .dept_id = D .dept_id LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON U .user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE U .user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY U .username, D .dept_name, U .mobile, U .email, U .avatar, U .remarks, U .sex, U .user_id, U .dept_id
